title: Florin Bărdașu
text: Florin Vasile Bărdașu (born 23 September 1991) is a <a href="Romanian%20people">Romanian</a> <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player. He plays in the <a href="Hooker%20%28rugby%20union%29">hooker</a> position for professional <a href="SuperLiga%20%28rugby%29">SuperLiga</a> club <a href="CSM%20Baia%20Mare%20%28rugby%29">Baia Mare</a> and formerly for <a href="Bucure%C8%99ti">București</a> based <a href="European%20Challenge%20Cup">European Challenge Cup</a> side the <a href="Bucure%C8%99ti%20Wolves">Wolves</a>. He also plays for Romania's national team the <a href="Romania%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Oaks</a>.
